name: acknowledge-alarm-request
description: Request to acknowledge an alarm or event.

fields.name: acknowledging-process-identifier
fields.description: The identifier of the process acknowledging the alarm.

fields.name: event-object-identifier
fields.description: The object identifier of the event being acknowledged.

fields.name: timestamp
fields.description: The timestamp of the event being acknowledged.

fields.name: acknowledgment-source
fields.description: A text string identifying the source of the acknowledgment.

fields.name: time-of-acknowledgment
fields.description: The timestamp when the acknowledgment was made.
